attributes.action: completely overhaul the tax credits system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
- A comprehensive training system in place for all employees
- A minimum turnaround for all claims
 - specialised offices for designated areas so we always get through to the same office.
 - To able to speak to someone who actually deals with your case, at present the actual tax credits office "do not speak to the public"

To sum up, the system in place is a complete joke and is not working, a mixture of overpayment, underpayments and sometimes no payments at all puts pressure on working families and childcare providers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
